item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! I’m Thang Pham, aka aome. I’m a Software Engineer at Waabi AI working on the onboard framework of next-generation self-driving trucks. I enjoy building software system and tinkering with cool/new technology. My current fields of interest are robotics and autonomous systems. During my free time, I enjoy listening to music while reading books, articles, and discussions from different websites. Fun facts I’m an ex-Competitive Programmer. Despite not being active anymore, you can still find me on Codeforces, Topcoder, and probably other online judges.
